data.text:
RESIDENTIAL PROPANE

With both keep full and will call options, Scotland Oil has a service plan sure to meet your needs.

TANK SETS

No fee tank sets at Scotland Oil. We closely maintain our tanks, so any repairs are on us; saving you time, money, and the headache.

FARM FUELS

Our goal is to keep you in the field without missing a beat with our full line of diesel, gas, and oil. Get back to doing what you love and leave the fuel to us.

COMMERCIAL FUELS

Our fleet is able to keep up with the needs of all size commercial accounts from small warehouses to large gas stations.

LUBRICANTS / GREASES / OILS

We carry a full line of lubricants, greases and oil to keep your equipment running smoothly. We are also able to make bulk deliveries to larger customers of certain products.
